snippet.title: "Nazi Zombies: Portable" Nintendo Switch Gameplay (Call of Duty: Zombies Remake)
snippet.description:
Vanillo version: https://vanillo.tv/v/9ck3B7ZAOil

Some footage of Nacht der Untoten from my Call of Duty: Zombies Remake in the Quake engine. Supporting the PlayStation Portable & VITA, Nintendo 3DS & Switch, Windows, Mac, and Linux.

Also playable in your browser:
https://nzp.gay/

Download and Source code:
https://github.com/nzp-team/nzportable

Development started in 2009 and has been steadily active since. You can support the project to speed up development on my end by becoming a Patron:
https://patreon.com/cypressimplex

I also support one-time donations via PayPal:
https://paypal.me/ibdev

The product is mostly feature equivalent with Call of Duty: World at War. However, there are a few hurdles such as a more advanced AI that need to be overcome, and will be overcome eventually. I decided to upload this video because every single active query on YouTube is from very old builds and/or is an installation tutorial that barely showcases gameplay.
